description: Developed and maintained front-end components for customer service and CRM systems. Utilized [specific technologies, e.g., React, Angular, Vue] to create user-friendly interfaces and enhance user experience.

Ensured the quality and performance of the e-commerce mobile app. Performed thorough testing, identified and resolved bugs, and collaborated with development teams to improve the overall user experience.
Gained hands-on experience in IoT cloud systems development. Contributed to the design, implementation, and testing of IoT applications, including data collection, processing, and visualization.
